mapper.select: SELECT * FROM medical_records mr INNER JOIN prescriptions p ON mr.record_id = p.medical_record_id INNER JOIN doctors d ON d.doctor_no = mr.doctor_no inner join users u on u.user_no = mr.user_no AND d.doctor_no = #{doctorNo}

select p.*, (select user_name from users where user_no = mr.doctor_no) as doctor_name from medical_records mr inner join prescriptions p on mr.record_id = p.medical_record_id inner join users u on u.user_no = mr.user_no and u.user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT p.*, u.user_name AS doctor_name, md.department_name, mr.user_no FROM prescriptions p JOIN medical_records mr ON p.medical_record_id = mr.record_id JOIN users u ON mr.doctor_no = u.user_no JOIN doctors d ON mr.doctor_no = d.doctor_no JOIN medical_department md ON d.department = md.department_no where mr.user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT p.*, u.user_name AS doctor_name, md.department_name, mr.user_no FROM prescriptions p JOIN medical_records mr ON p.medical_record_id = mr.record_id JOIN users u ON mr.doctor_no = u.user_no JOIN doctors d ON mr.doctor_no = d.doctor_no JOIN medical_department md ON d.department = md.department_no where p.prescription_id = #{prescriptionId}
